title: Pappy's Homemade Christmas Irish Cream
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

Your Pappy is a closet genius when it comes to food and drink. He has this special talent to learn a recipe and make subtle tweaks that just make the whole recipe unique and blossom into something that everyone craves. This particular recipe is for when you get older! I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients

* 1 cup heavy cream
* 1 14oz can of sweetened condensed milk
* 1 ⅔ cups Irish whiskey (Canadian Club)
* 1 teaspoon instant coffee granules
* 2 tablespoons chocolate syrup
* 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
* 1 teaspoon almond extract
### Preparation

* In a blender combine all ingredients and blend on high for 20-30 seconds
* Store in a tightly sealed container in the refrigerator
* Shake well before serving
